mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ( SELECT count(*) FROM sg_theme_answer_log WHERE user_id = #{id} AND score >= 60 ) AS num, ( SELECT FORMAT(AVG(score), 2) AS score FROM sg_theme_answer_log WHERE user_id = #{id} ) AS avgScore, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(score), 0) AS maxScore FROM sg_theme_answer_log WHERE user_id = #{id} ) AS maxScore FROM sg_theme_answer_log
